name: illimitably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that has no limit: It's a language that is supple, sensitive, and illimitably responsive and receptive. His eye followed the rows and rows of pylons, the horizon stretching illimitably.
More examplesFewer examplesHe described slang as humanity's attempt to express itself illimitably.Course participants will learn about the basic biology of a bird and how that model has been illimitably adapted.We cannot just keep speeding down this path illimitably.We like to think that time stretches illimitably into the future.
